content: gnome among flowers hat pattern by dani gradisher gauge 26 stitches and 30 row equal 4 inches materials  2 sizes of knitting needles o smaller size for ribbing o larger size for stockinette colorwork  2 colors of yarn fingering weight pattern 1 cast on 144 stitches using smaller needles and long-tail method or preferred technique 2 rib for however long you want the brim to be 3 knit one round in stockinette adding 6 stitches total stitches 150 4 transition to larger needles and start colorwork chart located on page 2 5 on colorwork round 30 after knitting gnome stitch #17 and flowers stiches #22 yo 4x using the contrast color to store yarn for rounds 31 and 32 knit rest of chart as usual 6 on colorwork rounds 31 and 32 use stored contrast color to knit remaining contrast color stitches 7 make crown using preferred technique © 2026 dani gradisher chart © 2026 dani gradisher
